body.value:
{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').output.pipelineName} SUCCEEDED!",
    "message": "Pipeline run finished successfully!",
    "color": "Green",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
}

{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').output.pipelineName} FAILED!",
    "message": "Error: @{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').error.message}",
    "color": "Red",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline - PL_Filter').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
 }
